step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and fingers open as you prepare to move.
As you stretch your arms overhead, ensure your fingers are spread wide.
When making a fist and pushing down, focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale.
As you stretch back overhead, exhale and consciously relax your muscles.
Continue to focus on the full range of motion, stretching arms overhead and relaxing.
Second rep, maintain a comfortable posture. Keep those fingers open as you begin.
Good job stretching overhead. Ensure your fingers are spread wide to maximize the movement.
Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you make a fist and push down. Remember to inhale.
As you return to the overhead stretch, exhale and allow your muscles to relax fully.
Excellent work completing the second rep. You're doing great with the full range of motion.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching overhead and squeeze your shoulder blades together when pushing down. Focus on inhaling during the push and exhaling as you relax.
